title: inelasticsupply
author: inelasticsupply
created_time: November 17, 2022, 03:34:01 AMLast edit: November 21, 2022, 03:29:41 AM by inelasticsupply
content: .1 or .5 SILVER Casascius and .5 Brass. Prefered in a yellow ANACS holder but open to any! Thanks in advance!

comments.author: inelasticsupply
comments.body: Looking for anacs graded pieces (but NOT a must). Funded or unfunded. A .5 brass cas would be cool.

comments.author: bitcoinbass
comments.body: You should message , @Spokanistan51 .He will be able to assist you.

comments.author: realsteelboy
comments.body: I have ICG MS69 0.1 and 0.5 in silver. What’s your offer?

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: I have a Silver .5 Cas, graded also PCGS MS66. The rarity and demand of the low denom Silver Cas's are driving high premiums.For people that are looking to buy, the Silver .5 I think you would expect to pay 2x load. For the Silver .1 tenths 3x load or even higher. I know those prices may seem high to some, but that is the average ask for my sellers I have communicated with. I have seen Silver .1 tenths up to 5x load on ask price.  At around 900 made for the .5's and around 800 made for the .1's, the demand continues to grow for these rare pieces.
